mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORD (W_WORD, W_FOUND, W_RATIO) VALUES(#{wordWord}, 1, 1 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD) AS b2) * 100)
mapper.update: UPDATE WORD SET W_FOUND = COALESCE((SELECT w2.W_FOUND FROM (SELECT W_FOUND FROM WORD WHERE W_WORD = #{wordWord}) AS w2), 0) + 1, W_RATIO = (COALESCE((SELECT w2.W_FOUND FROM (SELECT W_FOUND FROM WORD WHERE W_WORD = #{wordWord}) AS w2), 0) + 1) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD) AS b2) * 100 WHERE W_WORD = #{wordWord};
